text: I think I know what synesthesia is it's
sort of like what happens when you're
tripping different parts of your brain
control the sensation of the perception
of vision or of hearing or of smell or
of taste and a lot of those areas in the
brain are neighbors my name is Nadia
ortel and I'm a DIY
neuroscientist in some people the
connection between those neighboring
areas is much stronger than in other
people and those people have synesthesia
they can see colors associated with
numbers or shapes or letters or words
I'm Jordan I'm Justin and we both have
synesthesia and we're
dating well I see every letter has a
color and every number has a color so I
had it my whole life and I thought it
was totally normal to associate colors
in numbers and letters in my head all my
numbers are they kind of correspond with
the rainbow I I have like ideas about
like the personality of numbers seven is
kind of a jerk three is like really nice
guy it's a good number people who have
synesthesia are usually much better at
memorizing things because they always
have two associations with every idea or
object or thing I remember distinctly
like when I was a little kid remembering
my phone number my first phone number
with colors green green gold red red
gold gold my name's actually really ugly
I don't like the way that it
look synesthesia is actually a really
common condition but also it's how our
brains work most of the time so you can
do this really simple experiment at home
to see what anesthesia actually looks
like cut out a bunch of shapes some like
this that are kind of pointy and spiky
and some like this which are round and a
bit softer put all these shapes in front
of your friend and ask them to associate
the two of them with one of two
categories one one which is a nonsense
word Kiki and the other which is a
nonsense word Boba who are Kiki and BBA
they're like Miyazaki characters Kiki
kind of sounds like spiky and sharp and
Boba kind of sounds round and soft and
you'll find that actually everybody
Associates these types of shapes with
Kiki and these types of shapes with Boba
everyone feels this way that's creepy no
that's not how it works is that how it
works I have no control over my mind oh
that looks exactly like what I did
I guess everyone has a little bit of
synesthesia in
them

wow
